meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: $100.5 Million Bias Verdict A Richmond jury ordered Nationwide Insurance to pay $100.5 million to a local housing group that had accused the company of refusing to sell homeowner policies to black residents. Page C1.
Archimedes Text for Sale A millenium-old volume of the calculations and drawings of Archimedes, written on animal skin and erased and written over, is to go on the auction block Thursday. Page F5.
